wikitext.*:
'''Malduin''' was a minor river of northern [[Beleriand]]. It flowed southwards from the [[Ered Wethrin]] to meet the [[Teiglin]] before that river passed under the eaves of the [[Forest of Brethil]].<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>

It means "Golden River" in [[Sindarin]], from [[MALAT|MAL]] ("gold") + ''[[duin]]'' ("river").<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entries ''[[mal-]]'', ''[[duin]]''</ref>
{{references}}
